auth_config.name: api_key
auth_config.label: Telegram bot API Key
auth_config.message: Telegram bot API Key will be used for sending text, images, audio, video, poll.

text.text: Text of the message to be sent 1-4096 characters after entities parsing

chat_id.text: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

entities.text: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in message text which can be specified instead of parse_mode

parse_mode.text: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. Values: MarkdownV2, Markdown, HTML

reply_markup.text: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard custom reply keyboard instructions to remove reply keyboard or to force a reply from the user.

protect_content.text: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving

reply_parameters.text: Description of the message to reply to

message_effect_id.text: Unique identifier of the message effect to be added to the message; for private chats only

message_thread_id.text: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only

reply_to_message_id.text: If the message is a reply ID of the original message

disable_notification.text: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

business_connection_id.text: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which the message will be sent

disable_web_page_preview.text: Disables link previews for links in this message

allow_sending_without_reply.text: Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found

meta.description: Send text messages

limit.text: Limits the number of updates to be retrieved. Values between 1-100 are accepted. Defaults to 100.

offset.text: Identifier of the first update to be returned. Must be greater by one than the highest among the identifiers of previously received updates. By default updates starting with the earliest unconfirmed update are returned. An update is considered confirmed as soon as getUpdates is called with an offset higher than its update_id. The negative offset can be specified to retrieve updates starting from -offset update from the end of the updates queue. All previous updates will forgotten.

timeout.text: Timeout in seconds for long polling. Defaults to 0 i.e. usual short polling. Should be positive short polling should be used for testing purposes only.

allowed_updates.text: A JSON-serialized list of the update types you want your bot to receive. For example specify [‚Äúmessage‚Äù ‚Äúedited_channel_post‚Äù ‚Äúcallback_query‚Äù] to only receive updates of these types. See Update for a complete list of available update types. Specify an empty list to receive all update types except chat_member (default). If not specified the previous setting will be used.Please note that this parameter doesn't affect updates created before the call to the getUpdates so unwanted updates may be received for a short period of time.

meta.description: Fetch mesage updates

chat_id.text: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

message_id.text: Message identifier in the chat specified in from_chat_id

from_chat_id.text: Unique identifier for the chat where the original message was sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)

protect_content.text: Protects the contents of the forwarded message from forwarding and saving

message_thread_id.text: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only

disable_notification.text: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

meta.description: Forward various messages

url.text: Required. HTTPS URL to send updates to. Use an empty string to remove webhook integration

ip_address.text: Optional. The fixed IP address which will be used to send webhook requests instead of the IP address resolved through DNS

certificate.text: Optional. Upload your public key certificate so that the root certificate in use can be checked. See our self-signed guide for details.

secret_token.text: Optional. A secret token to be sent in a header ‚ÄúX-Telegram-Bot-Api-Secret-Token‚Äù in every webhook request 1-256 characters. Only characters A-Z a-z 0-9 _ and - are allowed. The header is useful to ensure that the request comes from a webhook set by you.

allowed_updates.text: Optional. A JSON-serialized list of the update types you want your bot to receive. For example specify [‚Äúmessage‚Äù ‚Äúedited_channel_post‚Äù ‚Äúcallback_query‚Äù] to only receive updates of these types. See Update for a complete list of available update types. Specify an empty list to receive all update types except chat_member (default). If not specified the previous setting will be used.Please note that this parameter doesn't affect updates created before the call to the setWebhook so unwanted updates may be received for a short period of time.

max_connections.text: Optional. The maximum allowed number of simultaneous HTTPS connections to the webhook for update delivery 1-100. Defaults to 40. Use lower values to limit the load on your bot's server and higher values to increase your bot's throughput.

drop_pending_updates.text: Optional. Pass True to drop all pending updates

meta.description: Set webhook URL, receive updates, ensure security

drop_pending_updates.text: Optional. Pass True to drop all pending updates

meta.description: Remove webhook integration, switch to getUpdates

caption.text: Optional. New caption for media 0-1024 characters after entities parsing. If not specified the original caption is kept

chat_id.text: Required. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

message_id.text: Required. Message identifier in the chat specified in from_chat_id

parse_mode.text: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the new caption. See formatting options for more details.

from_chat_id.text: Required. Unique identifier for the chat where the original message was sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)

reply_markup.text: Optional. Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard custom reply keyboard instructions to remove reply keyboard or to force a reply from the user.

protect_content.text: Optional. Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving

caption_entities.text: Optional. A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the new caption which can be specified instead of parse_mode

message_thread_id.text: Optional. Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only

reply_to_message_id.text: Optional. If the message is a reply ID of the original message

disable_notification.text: Optional. Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

allow_sending_without_reply.text: Optional. Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found

meta.description: Copy various messages, excluding some types. No link provided

url.text: Webhook URL, may be empty if webhook is not set up

allowed_updates.text: A list of update types the bot is subscribed to. Defaults to all update types except chat_member

last_error_date.text: Unix time for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook

max_connections.text: The maximum allowed number of simultaneous HTTPS connections to the webhook for update delivery

last_error_message.text: Error message in human-readable format for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook

has_custom_certificate.text: True, if a custom certificate was provided for webhook certificate checks

last_synchronization_error_date.text: Unix time of the most recent error that happened when trying to synchronize available updates with Telegram datacenters

meta.description: Get current webhook status

photo.text: Photo to send. Pass a file_id as String to send a photo that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended) pass an HTTP URL as a String for Telegram to get a photo from the Internet or upload a new photo using multipart/form-data. The photo must be at most 10 MB in size. The photo's width and height must not exceed 10000 in total. Width and height ratio must be at most 20. More information on Sending Files

caption.text: Photo caption (may also be used when resending photos by file_id) 0-1024 characters after entities parsing

chat_id.text: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

parse_mode.text: Mode for parsing entities in the photo caption. See formatting options for more details.

has_spoiler.text: Set true if the photo needs to be covered with a spoiler animation

reply_markup.text: Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard custom reply keyboard instructions to remove reply keyboard or to force a reply from the user.

protect_content.text: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving

caption_entities.text: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the caption which can be specified instead of parse_mode

message_thread_id.text: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only

reply_to_message_id.text: If the message is a reply ID of the original message

disable_notification.text: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

show_caption_above_media.text: Pass True, if the caption must be shown above the message media

allow_sending_without_reply.text: Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found

meta.description: Send photos

enum: <file_attach_name>‚Äù if the thumbnail was uploaded using multipart
form-data under <file_attach_name>. More information on Sending Files ¬ª
thumb.text: Optional. Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail's width and height should not exceed 320. Ignored if the file is not uploaded using multipart/form-data. Thumbnails can't be reused and can be only uploaded as a new file so you can pass ‚Äúattach

video.text: Required. Video to send. Pass a file_id as String to send a video that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended) pass an HTTP URL as a String for Telegram to get a video from the Internet or upload a new video using multipart/form-data. More information on Sending Files ¬ª

caption.text: Optional. Video caption (may also be used when resending videos by file_id) 0-1024 characters after entities parsing

chat_id.text: Required. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

duration.text: Optional. Duration of sent video in seconds

parse_mode.text: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the video caption. See formatting options for more details.

reply_markup.text: Optional. Additional interface options. A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard custom reply keyboard instructions to remove reply keyboard or to force a reply from the user.

message_thread_id.text: Optional. Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of the forum; for forum supergroups only

supports_streaming.text: Optional. Pass True if the uploaded video is suitable for streaming

disable_notification.text: Optional. Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

allow_sending_without_reply.text: Optional. Pass True if the message should be sent even if the specified replied-to message is not found

emoji.text: Emoji on which the dice throw animation is based. Currently must be one of ‚Äúüé≤‚Äù ‚ÄúüéØ‚Äù ‚ÄúüèÄ‚Äù ‚Äú‚öΩ‚Äù ‚Äúüé≥‚Äù or ‚Äúüé∞‚Äù.Dice can have values 1-6 for ‚Äúüé≤‚Äù ‚ÄúüéØ‚Äù and ‚Äúüé≥‚Äù values 1-5 for ‚ÄúüèÄ‚Äù and ‚Äú‚öΩ‚Äù and values 1-64 for ‚Äúüé∞‚Äù. Defaults to ‚Äúüé≤‚Äù

telegram__/bot-token/uploadstickerfile__.text: Upload sticker PNG for future use in sticker sets

user_id.text: Required.User identifier of sticker file owner

png_sticker.text: Required.PNG image with the sticker must be up to 512 kilobytes in size dimensions must not exceed 512px and either width or height must be exactly 512px.More information on Sending Files

telegram__/bot-token/createnewstickerset.text: Make a user's new sticker set

name.text: Required.Short name of sticker set to be used in t.me/addstickers/ URLs (e.g.animals).Can contain only English letters digits and underscores.Must begin with a letter can't contain consecutive underscores and must end in "_by_<bot_username>".<bot_username> is case insensitive.1-64 characters.

emojis.text: Required.One or more emoji corresponding to the sticker

user_id.text: Required.User identifier of created sticker set owner

png_sticker.text: Optional.PNG image with the sticker must be up to 512 kilobytes in size dimensions must not exceed 512px and either width or height must be exactly 512px.Pass a file_id as a String to send a file that already exists on the Telegram servers pass an HTTP URL as a String for Telegram to get a file from the Internet or upload a new one using multipart/form-data.More information on Sending Files ¬ª

enum: core.telegram.org
stickers#animated-sticker-requirements for technical requirements
tgs_sticker.text: Optional.TGS animation with the sticker uploaded using multipart/form-data.See https

sticker_type.text: Optional.Type of stickers in the set pass ‚Äúregular‚Äù or ‚Äúmask‚Äù.Custom emoji sticker sets can't be created via the Bot API at the moment.By default a regular sticker set is created.

enum: core.telegram.org
stickers#video-sticker-requirements for technical requirements
webm_sticker.text: Optional.WEBM video with the sticker uploaded using multipart/form-data. See https

mask_position.text: Optional.A JSON-serialized object for position where the mask should be placed on faces

meta.description: Create user-owned sticker set for bot

Optional.PNG image with the sticker must be up to 512 kilobytes in size dimensions must not exceed 512px and either width or height must be exactly 512px.

stickers#animated-sticker-requirements for animated sticker technical requirements or a WEBM video with the thumbnail up to 32 kilobytes in size; see https
thumb.text: Optional.A PNG image with the thumbnail must be up to 128 kilobytes in size and have width and height exactly 100px or a TGS animation with the thumbnail up to 32 kilobytes in size; see https

offset.text: Optional.Sequential number of the first photo to be returned.By default all photos are returned.
